languages.text: "Однако отправитель хотел, чтобы вот это", {n}— Ханн широким жестом обводит окрестности, указывая на разрушение и трупы мутировавшей команды, —{/n} "чтобы вот это случилось с вашим кораблем, а не нашим".

traits.locale_text: "Однако отправитель хотел, чтобы вот это", {n}— Ханн широким жестом обводит окрестности, указывая на разрушение и трупы мутировавшей команды, —{/n} "чтобы вот это случилось с вашим кораблем, а не нашим".

languages.text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."
languages.original_text: "Однако отправитель хотел, чтобы вот это", {n}— Ханн широким жестом обводит окрестности, указывая на разрушение и трупы мутировавшей команды, —{/n} "чтобы вот это случилось с вашим кораблем, а не нашим".

traits.locale_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

"However, that leaves us with only one explanation — intentional sabotage. Someone wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."
"However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

"However, that leaves us with only one explanation — intentional sabotage. Someone wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."
"However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."
"However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

languages.text: 「しかし、その荷主はこの有様を…」{n}ハンは破壊された船内や周囲に倒れているクルーの死体を手を振りながら指した。{/n}「…我々の船ではなく、あなたの船に仕掛けるつもりだったのです」
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、その荷主はこの有様を…」{n}ハンは破壊された船内や周囲に倒れているクルーの死体を手を振りながら指した。{/n}「…我々の船ではなく、あなたの船に仕掛けるつもりだったのです」

languages.text: “然而，寄件人本打算让这场惨剧……”{n}汉恩朝周遭的一片狼藉与船员的尸体做个手势。{/n}“……发生在您的船上，而不是我们的船上。”
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: “然而，寄件人本打算让这场惨剧……”{n}汉恩朝周遭的一片狼藉与船员的尸体做个手势。{/n}“……发生在您的船上，而不是我们的船上。”

languages.text: «Sin embargo, el remitente quería que todo esto...». {n}Hann gesticula, indicando la destrucción y los cadáveres de tripulantes que le rodean.{/n} «... le sucediera a su nave y no a la nuestra».
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, el remitente quería que todo esto...». {n}Hann gesticula, indicando la destrucción y los cadáveres de tripulantes que le rodean.{/n} «... le sucediera a su nave y no a la nuestra».

languages.text: « Toutefois, le responsable aurait préféré que tout ceci arrive à votre vaisseau plutôt qu'au nôtre. » {n}D'un geste large, Hann appuie ses propos en montrant la destruction et les cadavres tout autour de lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: « Toutefois, le responsable aurait préféré que tout ceci arrive à votre vaisseau plutôt qu'au nôtre. » {n}D'un geste large, Hann appuie ses propos en montrant la destruction et les cadavres tout autour de lui.{/n}

languages.text: "In jedem Fall wollte der Absender, dass das alles ..." {n}– Hann macht eine raumgreifende Geste über die Zerstörung und die Leichen von Crewmitgliedern um sich herum –{/n} ..."auf Eurem Schiff passiert, nicht auf unserem."
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: "In jedem Fall wollte der Absender, dass das alles ..." {n}– Hann macht eine raumgreifende Geste über die Zerstörung und die Leichen von Crewmitgliedern um sich herum –{/n} ..."auf Eurem Schiff passiert, nicht auf unserem."

languages.text: "Gönderenin amacı buymuş." {n}Hann, eliyle çevresindeki yıkımı ve ölü tayfaları gösteriyor.{/n} "Ancak bizim gemimizde değil, sizinkinde yaşanmasını."
languages.original_text: "However, the sender wanted all of this," {n}Hann makes a sweeping gesture at the destruction and the corpses of crew members around him,{/n} "to happen to your ship, not ours."

traits.locale_text: "Gönderen bütün bunların yaşanmasını amaçlamış." {n}Hann eliyle çevresindeki yıkımı ve mürettebat üyelerinin cesetlerini gösteriyor.{/n} "Sizin geminizde yaşanmasını, bizimkinde değil."
